p: The LAPROSAVs and ETPPs, have, in addition, similar extension tasks analogous to the United States county extension offices. The INISAV, responsible for research and development of technologies in Cuba, has similar roles to the USDA Center for Plant Health Science and Technology (CPHST), which provides scientific support for PPQ regulatory decisions and operations, and the USDA Agricultural Research Service (ARS), which conducts research to develop and transfer solutions to agricultural problems ( Table 1).
